meanings.definition: To be present at (an event, meeting, etc.)
meanings.sent1: I attended the school play last night.
meanings.sent2: She always attends the weekly team meetings.
meanings.sent3: The cat attended the dog's birthday party, wearing a tiny hat.
meanings.sent4: His mind attended the lecture, but his thoughts were elsewhere.
meanings.sent5: The stars attended the night sky, shining brightly.

meanings.definition: To take care of (someone or something)
meanings.sent1: She attended to her sick friend all night.
meanings.sent2: The nurse attends to the needs of the patients.
meanings.sent3: The robot attended to the garden, watering the plants diligently.
meanings.sent4: Her love attended to his broken heart, healing it slowly.
meanings.sent5: The sunflower attended to the sun, following its path across the sky.
